assessmentPoint: How often do you successfully complete assigned tasks without requiring rework? (Rarely = 1, Always = 5)
How many new tools, technologies, or methodologies have you learned and applied in your role in the last 12 months? (None = 0, 3 = 3, 5+ = 5)
How frequently do you meet or exceed the expected technical/functional standards of your role? (Rarely = 1, Always = 5)
How many process or task improvements have you suggested in the last quarter? (None = 0, 5 = 5+)
How often do you independently resolve issues before escalation is required? (Rarely = 1, Always = 5)
How many times have you taken the lead on a task or project without being asked in the last year? (None = 1, 1-2 = 3, 3+ = 5)

assessmentArea: Operational Efficiency and Quality of Work
assessmentPoint: What percentage of your deliverables were submitted on or before the deadline in the last 3 months? (Rate yourself proportionately out of 100% where 0% = 0 and 100% = 5)

assessmentArea: Operational Efficiency and Quality of Work
assessmentPoint: How often do your deliverables pass quality checks without needing revisions? (Rarely = 1, Always = 5)

assessmentArea: Operational Efficiency and Quality of Work
assessmentPoint: How often have you observed or been told about positive recognition or appreciation for the quality of your work in the last year? Mention specific ones. (None = 0, 4-6 = 3, 10+ = 5)
How do you contribute to a collaborative team environment? Provide examples.
How many collaborative tasks or projects have you contributed to in the last Year? (None = 0, 3 = 3, 5+ = 5)
How many times have you supported or mentored a team member in the last Year? (None = 1, 3-5 = 3, 5+ = 5)
How many training sessions, workshops, or certifications have you completed in the last year? Please provide the certificates/proofs if needed. (None = 0, 3 = 3, 5+ = 5)
How many new skills or tools have you learned and applied to your work in the last year? (None = 0, 3 = 3, 5+ = 5)
How often do you dedicate time to self-directed learning or skill improvement? (Rarely = 1, Always = 5)
How many new tasks/projects have you taken full ownership of in the last quarter? (None = 1, 1-2 = 3, 3+ = 5)
How many critical decisions have you made or contributed to in your role in the last 6 months? Please mention the specific ones. (None = 0, 5+ = 5)
How often do you follow through and complete tasks without external reminders? (Rarely = 1, Always = 5)
